outcome: Internal faction feuds intensify as BCI systems fail catastrophically citywide.

events.description: The Innovators clash openly with Harmonists over emergency reform strategies for restoring BCI stability.
Uncontrolled BCI glitches cause widespread access denials, trapping citizens in public spaces overnight.
Council factions accuse each other of undermining system functions for political leverage.
Mass protests erupt in the city center, citizens demand accountability and transparency from the Council.
